title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 9-2.5 - Treatment of gain or loss from the sale of a partnership interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 9-2.5 - Treatment of gain or loss from the sale of a partnership interest

State Regulations

Where a corporation is a partner in a partnership, any
gain or loss that is recognized from the sale of the corporation's interest in
such partnership and included in entire net income is business income or
loss. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
9-2.5

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
